#include <bits/stdc++.h>>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	char s[100005];
	cin>>s;
	int k=strlen(s);
	int q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		long long int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		a=a%k;
		if(a==0)
		a=k;
		b=b%k;
		if(b==0)
		b=k;
		if(s[a-1]==s[b-1])
		cout<<"Yes\n";
		else cout<<"No\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
